info.summary:
Masami Hagiya works as a professor in Department of Computer Science, Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, University of Tokyo, and his\her h-index is 18, g-index is 29. His\Her interests are :
 Dna Computing; Model Checking; DNA; Molecular Computing; Dna Molecule;
